name: Cactus Sprint
description:
Sprint through obstacles and challenges while finding new abilities, to get score as high as possible!

The game is a classic infinity runner game, but with moba style spells(q,w,e,r) and upgrades in shop, you can also find random buffs and slowly experience the match getting harder.

Cactus Sprint developed for fun at free time in around 3months.

Some gifs:

Ultimate Ability


Becarefull getting hit!

Visit the shop

Controls:

A , D  or Left key,Right key   == >  Move left or right
Space                                               == >  Jump
ESC or P                                         == >  Pause and some settings
Q                                                         == >  Protection spell*
W                                                        == >  Double finding*
E                                                          == >  Slow pill*
R                                                          == >  Ultimate*

More info about the spells, will be introduced in a short ~1minute tutorial in game! Don't skip it to understand better ;D

Update:

Just added MAC download, but have no way to test it out atm. If you find there any problem let me know, i will fix it asap :D

Have fun, hope you like the game, leave comments! System requirements

The game was tested on pretty old pc with HD 5450 gpu, it's super weak and equivalent to intel HD 3000 or GeForce 310m, and ran on average 30 fps on worst settings at 1080p resolution.

Most likely you have better GPU so it will run smooth ultra.

CPU anything unless it's ultra ancient should be good, same about RAM.

The game takes about 350MB after extracted.
